question: The Government of India and World Bank has signed a 125 million dollar agreement for the Innovate in India for the Inclusiveness Project (I3). This project aims:
option1: at developing innovative biopharmaceutical and medical devices
option2: to develop technologies to boost the use of electric and hybrid vehicles
option3: to boost the investments in defence technologies in the country
option4: at enhancing the skills of labour force in India to make them globally competent
answer: at developing innovative biopharmaceutical and medical devices
explanation: The program named Innovate in India (i3) aims an investment of USD 250 million with USD 125 million as a loan from World Bank. It is anticipated to be a game changer for the Indian Biopharmaceutical industry. The aim of the Mission is to “Enable and nurture an ecosystem for preparing India’s technological and product development capabilities in biopharmaceuticals to a level that will be globally competitive over the next decade, and transform the health standards of India’s population through affordable product development”.
